alert.note: Alert for Albany (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 11 at 1:41PM MDT until October 11 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Albany County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 141 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Rock River to 9 miles northwest of Laramie, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rock River, Bosler, Wheatland Reservoir 3 and Baldy Peak. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 287 and 304. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
